name: Hookwave
description:
Details

Hookwave is a first person platformer where you need to use a hook and a bump to run and fly through levels as fast as possible.

Project for IIM, 2nd year. The game contains one tutorial level and one demonstration level.

Controls

ZQSD = Move

Space = Jump, detach hook

Left click = Shoot Hook, pull on the hook

Right click = Bump, slow down time




Credits :

Game Artist : da Silva Opter Judicaël

Game Programmers : Pejoiane Arthur - Malka Romain

Game Designers : de Leuze Romain - Perré-Moutier Gaëtan

Music by Mathis Merolla
